{{Wireless embedded system |brand=U4EA Technologies |model=Fusion 70 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/16/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model=WP711AP-US |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=PPQ-FUSION70 |ic_id=4491A-FUSION70 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Lite-On WN2601A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9160 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9103 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model=VSC8601XKN |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} OEM Lite-On, Atheros PB44 Board variant
Openwrt can be installed to these units see [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=65879 PB44 Board] flash has 2 images, :one can be erased and used with modded firmware, but the flash partitions names must :be the same as stock, you can add more as long as the initial names are on the flash
